titles.title: Domestic Violence Firearm Prevention Act
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prevent persons who have committed domestic abuse from obtaining a firearm.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14011-14012)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7481)

bill.summary: 10/20/1993--Introduced. Domestic Violence Firearm Prevention Act - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit the sale or other disposal of firearms or ammunition to, or the receipt of firearms or ammunition by, persons convicted of offenses involving domestic abuse.
